content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = 'mipins' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [mipins]');
GO

--CREATE VIEW FOR PERSONNEL SUB AREA--

-- CREATE OR ALTER VIEW mipins.vw_mipins_hr_fact_sickness
-- AS

SELECT DISTINCT

EmployeeID AS StaffNumber,
FinancialYear AS MeasureYear,
COUNT(*) as SiicknessCount

FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_absence_dim] abs
FULL JOIN [default].[dbo].[calendar_dim_plus] date on date.CalendarDate = abs.AbsenceStartDate

GO
